name: ScatterCube
description: receives the number of elements, size, colors and three list of positions for a scatterplot with 3 dimensions.

params.name: count
params.description: The number of elements to draw. Used if no position arrays are defined or if it have different lengths

params.name: size
params.description: Number to define the same size for all elements. (1-4)

params.name: ColorArray
params.description: Strings array or Arrays array with the list of normalized colors (rgb) for each element. Or Array with 3 expressions, can use 'x','y','z' positions, and 'i' index for each element

params.name: listX
params.description: Array with the x positions of the points

params.name: listY
params.description: Array with the y positions of the points

params.name: listZ
params.description: Array with the z positions of the points
